description: Worms-eye OBJECT POV (as object). The worms-eye moniker gets its namesake from shots that appear to us how the world might appear to a worm on the ground. We just happen to have the perspective of those pair of shoes.

title: We Are Penn State
description: Close-up object POV (as object). While the character is looking at camera, from their perspective they are looking at something through a magnifying glass. We just happen to be viewing her from the perspective of that object. If you're ever wondering if its fourth wall or object POV (as object), ask yourself if the character is acknowledging the camera as a camera, or as an object in their world.

alt_text: Sabrina Carpenter Ft. Jenna Ortega - Taste
title: Sabrina Carpenter Ft. Jenna Ortega - Taste (2024)
description: In Sabrina Carpenter's music video for "Taste," co-starring Jenna Ortega, the duo engage in a gory, darkly comedic rivalry over a two-timing boyfriend. Directed by Dave Meyers, the video features numerous campy horror and cult film references, including scenes inspired by Death Becomes Her and Kill Bill. Carpenter and Ortega repeatedly murder each other in elaborate ways, including stabbings, voodoo dolls, and falls from great heights, only to make up with a kiss. In collaboration with Jacobi Mehringer, Anna Arnell, and Lizzy Walker.
